system.description: At 3rd level, you gain proficiency with the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.y5b8gyl8oekwj44y]{Hand Crossbow} as well as the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.o5jeeze2r4k167r2]{Ratcheting Crossbow} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.f270hnmd1wlu9mb0]{Geared Slingshot} rare weapons.  At your Narrator's discretion you also gain proficiency with firearms if they exist in the setting you are playing in (including the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.mv682vbjut9nizx1]{Sword Pistol}). You may also add your Intelligence modifier to the saving throw DC for @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.5phxxco5a853etuy]{Hunting Traps} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-adventuring-gear.Item.yrsiymhg2jgu9vdd]{Black Powder Charges} and the damage they deal.  You may set either one as a bonus action, and may set a black powder charge to go off at the beginning of any turn prior to your next one.  If firearms exist in your setting and you take @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-feats.Item.fs2rwplugvwip86h]{Crossbow Expertise}, you may use a bonus action to attack with a one handed firearm in your off-hand, though you do not ignore the loading property on them.
